name: I Fight For The Cup
description:
Face an AI that defends the world cup at any cost.

no fair play in this game. i give the possibility with this game to win the world cup in a slightly different way

each player has slightly different traits up to you to find the player that suits you best to win. or take the country that is close to your heart.

Swiss "Switzerland is playable, but in invincible mode due to a small bug"

ps:

I worked on this little game prototype in 2 days. he has no specific objectif apart from fun

vote for team update #1
